name: discord-chat-bridge
description: Forward in-game chat messages to Discord with channel filtering and customizable formatting.
author: Sentinel Team

webhookUrl.description: Discord webhook URL for chat messages

channelFilter.description: Chat channels to forward (global, group, local, admin)

messagePrefix.description: Only forward messages starting with this prefix (leave empty for all messages)

stripPrefix.description: Remove the prefix from forwarded messages

embedMode.description: Use rich embeds instead of simple messages

embedColor.description: Embed color when embed mode is enabled (decimal, default: blue 0x5865F2)
